description: An attacker with no prior authentication could craft and send malicious script to SAP GUI for HTML within Fiori Launchpad, resulting in reflected cross-site scripting attack. This could lead to stealing session information and impersonating the affected user.

product.name: SAP NetWeaver AS ABAP (SAP GUI for HTML within the Fiori Launchpad)
